definition: Gan River in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]
abbr. for Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]/Gan River in Jiangxi Province 江西省[Jiang1 xi1 Sheng3]

sentences.english: The big floods occurred in Ganjiang River, now the water level dropped slightly.
sentences.chinese: 贛江發生大洪水，如今水位稍下降。

sentences.english: Gan River lower reaches Stream was divagated and transited several times in history.
sentences.chinese: 贛江下游河道在歷史上曾發生過多次改道變遷。

sentences.english: The priority is to facilitate navigation on the Gan River, particularly in the middle and lower reaches of the River.
sentences.chinese: 優先發展的重點是促進贛江尤其是中下游的航運發展。

sentences.english: It had a prosperous trading, especially around the GanJiang River.
sentences.chinese: 贛江兩岸呈現出沿岸城鎮過境貿易的繁華景象。

definition: Nanling mountain, on the border of Hunan, Jiangxi, Guangdong and Guangxi
Sanwan township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
the mountain road twists around each new peak (idiom)/(of a mountain road) twisting and turning/fig. an opportunity has come unexpectedly/things have taken a new turn
Poyang Lake in Shangrao 上饒|上饶[Shang4 rao2], Jiangxi
Yalu River, forming part of the China-Korea border
Nan'ao Island in Shantou 汕頭|汕头[Shan4 tou2], Guangdong
Longnan prefecture-level city in south Gansu
